column2: "Look, everyone, it's the sea! Hehe, this is going to be so much fun! Come on, Hitsugi!"
"Alright, coming! Harriet, didn't you say you're not used to wearing swimsuits? You gonna be alright?"

"Y-yes... My chest is less secure than I am used to, and the movement as I run is affecting my balance, but...
I will manage. Here I come!"
